sing.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: to produce a musical sound with your voice
sing.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: We had a great time singing some of the old songs.
I’ve never been able to sing in tune (=sing the correct notes).
She patiently sang the baby to sleep.
My mother used to sing to me when I was young.
He was singing to himself quietly.
Come on, sing us a song!
sing.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: if birds sing, they produce high musical sounds
sing.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: I could hear the birds singing outside my window.
sing.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: to make a high whistling sound
sing.translation[0].definitions[2].examp: A kettle was singing on the stove.
A bullet sang past my ear.
sing.translation[0].definitions[3].defin: to tell people everything you know about a crime when they ask you questions about it – used especially by criminals and the police
